name: Golokstone
tagline: Old, thick-boled trees creak and groan. The soil is orange, as if soaked with blood.

procedural.encounter_notes: Off-road encounters are 2-in-6 likely to be with 1d3+1 bramblings patrolling the region

description: Old, thick-boled trees creak and groan. The soil is orange, as if soaked with blood.

points_of_interest.name: The Jaunty Horn
points_of_interest.description: A high-gabled inn that spans the Ditchway, bridge-like. At the rear, a wide yard and stables bustle with caravans.
points_of_interest.interior: A broad, low-beamed space rammed with round tables, with hundreds of horseshoes cladding the walls. The proprietor Jesibelle Nag and her husband Mollish serve tables while their 7 children run and play. A 6′-long drinking horn hangs above the bar—downing a whole horn is a challenge the locals use to settle disputes.
points_of_interest.inhabitants: Common travellers, merchants, and surly guards. Jesibelle Nag and her husband Mollish serve tables while their 7 children run and play.
special_features: Sign: A curled bugle with a portrait of Lord Ramius (p65) engraved at its head. (The folk of the inn are Ramius loyalists, proudly retaining his portrait on the sign.)

points_of_interest.name: Golokstone
points_of_interest.description: A 10′ square slab of yellow sandstone, split down the middle, lies at the centre of a glade of lofty silver birches, surrounded by a maze of circuitous paths.
points_of_interest.entering: Dense patches of scarlet, 2′ high toadstools encircle the stone; they release a 20′ diameter cloud of spores if anyone approaches. All within must Save Versus Blast or experience vivid, religiously-tinged hallucinations for 1d6 Turns (–4 penalty to Attack Rolls and cannot cast spells). Aethogrym and his bramblings arrive after 1 Turn to evict the intruders.
points_of_interest.exploring: Peering into the split slab: Reveals an impossibly fathomless vista of swirling black and purple mists dotted with glinting points of silver, like stars. Scrying: Casting Crystal Vision or Arcane Eye while gazing into the vista brings about a trance, lasting for 1 Turn, wherein the spell-caster has a vision of Dolmenwood in its entirety and may choose to zoom into any one hex, gaining an insight into the hidden features there. Drunic speech: Uttering Drunic words into the vista opens a channel of communion to the Drune Aegis (p54).
points_of_interest.inhabitants: The Audrune Aethogrym, along with 7 bramblings (DMB) that roam the hex.
special_features: Inscriptions: Drunic runes describe the arcane spell Arcane Eye in addition to the inscription "Scry, Drune, all Dolmenwood spread wide. Speak, Drune, voice of the Aegis."
Ley line Lamm (p18): Arcane spell-casters feel observed by a pitiless malevolence.

npcs.name: Jesibelle Nag
npcs.title: Jaunty Horn Proprietor
npcs.description: A stout, muscular human woman in her late thirties, with a knotted brow and a wide, gurning face. Dresses in sheepskin jerkins, striped pantaloons, and purple felt boots, always leaving her heavily bangled arms bare. Jesibelle is a retired fighter who bought the Jaunty Horn with the profits from her adventures.
demeanor: but unerringly loyal to those who earn her respect
desires: To best tough-looking warrior types in bouts of arm-wrestling or drinking contests
To experience the thrill of adventure "one last time."
possessions: A golden Holy Mace (p412) concealed behind the bar

npcs.name: The Audrune Aethogrym
npcs.description: A towering (6′6″) human man of robust build, with shaven head and staring eyes as pale as moonlight. Wears a brass ring through his nose and dresses in the traditional night-black cloak and hood of his order. As guardian of Golokstone, Aethogrym is charged with deterring intruders, but favours words over violence.
npcs.speech: Slow, hearty rumble. Woldish, Caprice, Drunic.
desires: To defend Golokstone at all costs
To track down the fairy who spies on his daughter Pollith (see 0810) and ensure that he does not continue to do so
possessions: A bone bracelet, carved with mushrooms, which allows him to sense intruders at Golokstone and teleport to the vicinity
